item.title: Calacatta Monet Plump Dish
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is form, minimal, & void. The Calacatta Monet Plump Dish features a round shape with a thick curved edge, with two recessed voids located in the middle. The marble presents a white base wtih dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed in Australia by architectural designers. They are handmade by highly skilled stonemasons with years of experience. Each piece is made to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Lead time 1-2 weeks.
  • Delivered in 1-2 weeks.
  • Custom sizes & other natural stones available upon request.
  Download Spec Sheet – PDF
item.content:encoded:
• Dimension: 170mm (L) x  170mm (W) x 30mm (H).
  • Materials: Calacatta Monet Marble.
  • Colour: White, Purple, Grey.
  • Finish: Honed.
  • Weight: 1.5kg.

item.title: Calacatta Viola Marble Tray
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is minimal, slim & served. The Calacatta Viola Tray is a gorgeous rectangular pieces of natural stone ready to display your special items. The marble presents a white base with dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless. Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade to order, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.
  • Total lead & delivery time: 2-4 weeks.
  • Custom sizes and marble are available upon request.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 42x20x1.8cm.
Materials: Italian Calacatta Viola Marble.
Colour: White, Grey, Purple.
Finish: Honed.
Weight: 4kg.
Stone thickness: 1.8cm.

item.title: Calacatta Monet Marble Stand
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Category is minimal, black & raw edges. The Calacatta Monet Stand features an offcut stone piece top complementing 3x Matt Black Aluminium legs. The marble presents a white base with dark purple & grey veining throughout, simply timeless.
Designed by Australian architectural designers. They are handmade, no two pieces are the same due to the variation of the natural stone.

Weight: Approx. 1kg.
Stone thickness: 2cm.
Total height: 4cm.

item.title: Ms Pebble
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
The Category is smooth, round, curves the house down boots mama! Hand made locally in Sydney, no two are the same, it’s perfectly imperfect. This design presents a unique & soft feel to elevate and add that special touch to your room. Our adorable Ms Pebble serves as a great home for your jewellery, keys, perfume, or simply leave it empty for that minimal look. Perfect for any bench or table space.

 

Care:

Our stands & dishes are not food safe. As they’re a decor piece, it should not be used to place food. Our trays & dishes can be wiped down or lightly washed. Do not place in dishwasher, oven or microwave.
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 15cm (L) x 12cm (W) x2.7cm (H).

Colour: Stone-Beige. Each piece varies in colour & texture.

Weight: 450g.

Material: Pigment, stone, & concrete.

Finish: Natural.

item.title: Travertine Stone Stand
item.dc:creator: Categoryisstone
item.description:
Our beautiful travertine slabs will add elevation & a special touch to your bedside table, dresser, bathroom, or coffee table.

– Perfect to display your jewellery, wine, candles, perfume, & much more.
– Can be used as a display stand in the bathroom for soaps, bathroom products, or scented candles.
– Each piece is unique in size, shape, tone, and pattern.

Perfect addition to styling your home or as a gift to your loved one!
item.content:encoded:
Dimension: 24(L) x 22(W) cm (approx).
Thickness: 4.5cm (included 2.5cm support legs).
Material: Travertine & Brass.
Finish: Natural. Unfilled.
Weight: 2kg
